=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Destination Wedding [DVD]
Review Date: 2022/01/06
Store: Winona Ryder  (Actor),     Keanu Reeves  (Actor),     Victor Levin  (Director, Writer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
Product Description: ["The smart, witty, intimate modern romance Destination Wedding reunites two of cinema's most adored stars, Keanu Reeves and Winona Ryder, as the socially awkward Frank and Lindsay. When they meet on the way to a destination wedding, they soon discover they have a lot in common: they both hate the bride, the groom, the wedding, themselves, and most especially each other. As the weekend's events continually force them together—and their cheerlessness immediately isolates them from the other guests—Frank and Lindsay find that if you verbally spar with someone long enough, anything can happen. When debate gives way to desire, they must decide which is stronger: their hearts or their common sense.", ']]>']
Average Rating: 3.9

Glad I got to stream it. season 4 The Real Housewives of Orange County: Season 1 Jeana Tomasino (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles ['Desperate for more housewife drama? Then get ready for addictive, indulgent fun with Season One of Bravo\'s hit sensation, The Real Housewives of Orange County! Join five real-life ladies of leisure—Jo, Jeana, Lauri, Vicki and Kimberly—for an all-access pass inside their exclusive planned community. Whether they\'re sharing cocktails, shopping trips, travel plans or Botox treatments, these stylish women espose the realities of living in Southern California luxury! Available on DVD for the first time, this must-own 2-disc set includes every revealing episode from the first season, plus the can\'t-miss reunion special. For the best guilty pleasure entertainment around, take home this sensation that the New York Daily News calls "utterly" addictive.'] {'Genre': 'Television, DVD Movie, Television/Reality Shows, Blu-ray Movie', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Jeana Tomasino', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MOV-REALHWORANG', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '5 hours and 3 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 4, 2007', 'Actors': 'Jeana Tomasino', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'} I wish this show was available on Prime Instant but it's not so I bought the dvd (cheaper than 1.99 pay per view).
RHOC is the only version I watch. It was great to see the beginning again. It was great to see the beginning again Good Fortune John Paul DeJoria (Actor), Dan Aykroyd (Actor), Josh Tickell (Director), Rebecca Harrell Tickell (Director) & 1 more Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Documentary ["'Success unshared is failure.'GOOD FORTUNE is the rags to riches tale of conscious capitalism pioneer John Paul DeJoria. The son of Greek immigrants, born into humble beginnings in East Los Angeles, John Paul DeJoria has built a life full of good fortune and achieved vast wealth through a variety of businesses, among them John Paul Mitchell Hair Care Systems and Patron Tequila.In 1980, he partnered with Paul Mitchell to start a line of professional hair care products. They turned a $700 investment and 3 products into a wildly successful venture that today is worth more than $800 million. Proving his success wasn't just a fluke, John Paul then created the largest and the most recognizable tequila brand in the world - Patron.GOOD FORTUNE focuses on DeJoria's inspiring success story as well as his philanthropy. It's the true tale of a man who overcame obstacles and dedicates his life to giving back to those less fortunate. He ran through his early adulthood in and out of motorcycle gangs and today John Paul's quest is finding innovative ways to share his sizable fortune. DeJoria spends his life creating back-to-work programs for the homeless, fighting whale poachers in the Arctic and working on over 100 other philanthropic ventures. Along with Bill Gates and Warren Buffet DeJoria signed 'The Giving Pledge,' a formal promise to continue to contribute more than half of their wealth to philanthropy or charitable causes during their lifetime or in their will.Dan Aykroyd narrates the film spinning colorful stories with humor and wit. GOOD FORTUNE is an incredibly powerful and noble narrative that gives an informative and entertaining picture of this self-made billionaire and verifiable poster boy of the American dream."] {'Genre': 'Special Interests', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'John Paul DeJoria, Josh Tickell, Dan Aykroyd, Arianna Huffington, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Rebecca Harrell TickellJohn Paul DeJoria, Josh Tickell, Dan Aykroyd, Arianna Huffington, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Rebecca Harrell Tickell See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 26 minutes', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Director': 'Josh Tickell, Rebecca Harrell Tickell', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 26 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 14, 2017', 'Actors': 'John Paul DeJoria, Dan Aykroyd, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Arianna Huffington', 'Studio': 'Audio Fidelity', 'Number of discs': '1'} I heard about this dvd on The Garry Meier podcast out of Chicago. The price was fair on amazon so I immediately jumped on buying a copy. I did not know much about John Paul DeJoria except he was with Paul Mitchell Hair. This dvd is well edited and very entertaining. It's about an hour, maybe a little over. John Paul's life of "rags to riches" and ending up a philanthropic billionaire with a heart of gold was so heart warming to see. I shared this with several people who enjoyed it as well. Heart warming ! Dynasty Drama, Romance ["The 9th and final season of the primetime soap begins as Alexis is comforted by Dex's solace and friendship and the two renew their passionate love for each other. Fallon slips out of Jeff's room after Sammy Jo shows up unexpectedly to accept his marriage offer. Blake is devastated by his fear that Krystle's disappearance at the end of season 8 may by a severe mental disorder."] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Irving J. Moore', 'Don Medford'], 'Starring': ['Joan Collins', 'Linda Evans', 'John Forsythe']} Definitely not as good as previous seasons. I was not as engaged as I had been. Krystle played by Linda Evans departs the show which didn't help. Same with Steven. Definitely not as good as previous seasons So Undercover Miley Cyrus (Actor), Jeremy Piven (Actor), Tom Vaughan (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy ['A tough, street-smart private eye is hired by the FBI to go undercover in a college sorority.'] {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Tom Vaughan, Kelly Osbourne, Joshua Bowman, Miley Cyrus, Jeremy Piven', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FLKP14009DVD', 'Director': 'Tom Vaughan', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 5, 2013', 'Actors': 'Miley Cyrus, Jeremy Piven, Joshua Bowman, Kelly Osbourne', 'Studio': 'Alchemy / Millennium', 'Number of discs': '1'} I enjoy this movie for Jeremy Piven and having family ties to New Orleans/Tulane University. This movie stars Miley Cyrus who goes undercover as a student joining a sorority. It's a similar premise to Miss Congeniality. It's predictable and geared towards teens/college age IMO. Well cast and worth checking out for Miley or Jeremy or New Orleans. The third male lead, I forget his name, he was in the TV show Revenge. I watched this on Amazon. No issues. Elizabeth Hughes'], 'Starring': ['Robinne Lee', 'Dule Hill', 'Gabrielle Union'], 'Studio': ['Viacom']} I've been watching Psych on Amazon so I saw this pop up with Dule Hill and thought I would check it out to see how he was in a different format. He was much the same in this as he is on Psych. Also I kept expecting him to be the love interest but no it's Joel from Parenthood played by Sam Jaeger. Dule has a short scene and he shares a large part of the movie cover and Sam who is second most scenes is not even on the cover. Gabrielle Union is well known and also on he cover as is the cheating boyfriend in this movie. I am glad to see I am not the only one who noticed and commented on this misleading picture!!
I did enjoy this movie a lot more than I expected. **User Summary Update:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user continues to enjoy a diverse range of movie genres, maintaining a strong emphasis on comedy and fantasy, alongside a growing appreciation for romantic dramas. Their fondness for feel-good narratives and engaging documentaries persists, as does their preference for character-driven stories.

- **Actor Affinity:** Interest in Dule Hill remains strong, while a newfound affection for Keanu Reeves and Winona Ryder develops, particularly highlighted by their engaging on-screen chemistry. This aligns with the user’s appreciation for relatable characters and compelling performances.

- **Decision-Making:** Impulsive purchasing habits are still evident, especially when drawn to familiar themes and recognizable talent, indicating a desire for enjoyable content and immediate satisfaction.

- **Satisfaction Level:** The user’s low tolerance for predictability continues, although their appreciation for heartfelt storytelling has grown, enhancing their emotional connection to films.

- **Review Attitude:** The user provides straightforward feedback, emphasizing narrative quality. Their latest review demonstrates a discerning taste for witty dialogue and character interactions, acknowledging strengths in performances while celebrating their unique storytelling style.

- **Overall Rating:** The user maintains a clear distinction between star power and impactful storytelling, emphasizing their eclectic tastes in quality entertainment that balances nostalgia with a deeper appreciation for relatable characters.

In summary, the user values engaging narratives, strong performances, and clever dialogue, reinforcing their expectations for originality and quality in their viewing experiences while remaining critical of marketing tactics.
